flawed_nl_solution:
The t-shirt costs $10 more than the socks, so it costs $5 + $10 = $51.
The jeans are twice the price of the shirt, so they cost 2 * $51 = $<<2*51=102>>102.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 51. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
